def_cn: (神话中的)次神;(尤指)半神半人
def_en: In mythology, a demigod is a less important god, especially one who is half god and half human.

def_cn: 被神化的人，像神一样受人崇拜的人(如政治家、作家、音乐家等)
def_en: If you describe a famous or important person such as a politician, writer, or musician as a demigod, you mean that you disapprove of the way in which people admire them and treat them like a god.
